code:
flowchart TD
    A[AI Implementation Decision] --> B{Ethical Risk Assessment}
    
    B --> C[Privacy Risks]
    B --> D[Bias Risks]
    B --> E[Job Displacement Risks]
    B --> F[Transparency Risks]
    
    C --> C1[Employee Data Access]
    C --> C2[Calendar Information]
    C --> C3[Communication Monitoring]
    
    D --> D1[Algorithm Bias]
    D --> D2[Training Data Bias]
    D --> D3[Decision Making Bias]
    
    E --> E1[Task Automation]
    E --> E2[Role Redundancy]
    E --> E3[Skill Obsolescence]
    
    F --> F1[Black Box Decisions]
    F --> F2[Lack of Explainability]
    F --> F3[Trust Issues]
    
    C1 --> G[Mitigation Strategies]
    C2 --> G
    C3 --> G
    D1 --> G
    D2 --> G
    D3 --> G
    E1 --> G
    E2 --> G
    E3 --> G
    F1 --> G
    F2 --> G
    F3 --> G
    
    G --> H[Data Minimization]
    G --> I[Bias Auditing]
    G --> J[Reskilling Programs]
    G --> K[Explainable AI]
    
    H --> L[Implementation with Controls]
    I --> L
    J --> L
    K --> L
    
    L --> M[Continuous Monitoring]
    M --> N[Regular Assessment]
    N --> O[Adjustment & Improvement]
    
    style A fill:#ffcdd2
    style B fill:#f8bbd9
    style G fill:#c8e6c9
    style L fill:#dcedc8
    style O fill:#e1f5fe
repo_description: IIMK's Professional Certificate in Data Science and Artificial Intelligence for Managers
